pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Armor is the best armor that you can create.$(br)$(li)The durability of this armor is even more than the Netherite Armor.$(br)$(li)When you are wearing any piece of this set and you make a critical attack, you obtain the Regeneration II effect, regenerating your life.

pages.name: End Crystal Armor
pages.text: $(li)This armor has Armour Toughness too, giving you an extra protection from strong attacks. It has Knockback Resistance too, helping you to resist that other enemies push you far away.$(br)$(li)If you are wearing any piece of this suite, the Pigmans will not be aggressive towards you.
The End Crystal Armor can be made in a Smithing table, with the specific Diamond Armor piece and a End Crystal Ingot
